module.name: Asterisk CLI
module.description: Provides an interface allowing you to run a command as if it was typed into Asterisk CLI
module.changelog: *14.0.1* Add typeahead with common commands. *13.0.4* FREEPBX-12606 Absolute paths used in some modules. *13.0.3* Asterisk needs to be running for this to be useful *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1* Finalize *13.0.0.1* Rewrite for AJAX and BMO *2.11.0.0* bump release *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.2* #5047 *2.9.0.1* #4001 *2.9.0.0* set repo *2.8.0.0* published 2.8 version *2.7.0.0* spelling fixes, localization updates *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.0.2* description added to xml *2.5.0.1* r6547 Swedish Translations *2.5.0* #2917 execute CLI command direct through manager to remove vulnerabilities *2.4.0* 2.4 branch (added IT translations also) *1.1.2.1* bump for rc1 *1.1.2* fix syntax error, extra = *1.1.1* #2070 fix proper use of script tags *1.1* #2006 Fixed display on systems with colored asterisk console *1.0* Fixed security issue, first release in 2.2 *0.001* Original Release
